languages.text: Навигаторы — уникальные мутанты, служащие Человечеству проводниками в бушующем варпе. Только они способны узреть свет Астрономикона в Океане Душ и, используя его как маяк, проложить курс к далекой цели.

traits.locale_text: Навигаторы — уникальные мутанты, служащие Человечеству проводниками в бушующем варпе. Только они способны узреть свет Астрономикона в Океане Душ и, используя его как маяк, проложить курс к далекой цели.

languages.text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.
languages.original_text: Навигаторы — уникальные мутанты, служащие Человечеству проводниками в бушующем варпе. Только они способны узреть свет Астрономикона в Океане Душ и, используя его как маяк, проложить курс к далекой цели.

traits.locale_text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humankind as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humankind as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humankind as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

languages.text: Les navigateurs sont des mutants hors normes sans lesquels l'humanité ne pourrait affronter les turbulences du Warp. Ces guides sont les seuls à percevoir la lumière de l'Astronomican dans la Mer des Âmes, ce qui leur permet de mettre le cap sur des destinations lointaines.
languages.original_text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

traits.locale_text: Les navigateurs sont des mutants hors normes sans lesquels l'humanité ne pourrait affronter les turbulences du Warp. Ces guides sont les seuls à percevoir la lumière de l'Astronomican dans la Mer des Âmes, qui leur permet de mettre le cap sur des destinations lointaines.

languages.text: Los Navegantes son mutantes excepcionales que sirven a la Humanidad como guías por los terrores de la disformidad. Solo ellos pueden ver la luz del Astronomicón en el Mar de Almas y usarlo como faro para alcanzar un destino lejano.
languages.original_text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

traits.locale_text: Los Navegantes son mutantes excepcionales que sirven a la Humanidad como guías por los terrores de la disformidad. Solo ellos pueden ver la luz del Astronomicón en el mar de almas y usarlo como faro para alcanzar un destino lejano.

languages.text: 航宙士は、荒れ狂う歪みを進むガイドとして人類に奉仕する例外的な変異体だ。彼らだけが、魂の海に浮かぶ星辰波の光を見ることができ、それを導として遠くの目標への航路を設定することができるのだ。
languages.original_text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士は、荒れ狂う歪みを進むガイドとして人類に奉仕する例外的な変異体だ。彼らだけが、魂の海に浮かぶ星辰波の光を見ることができ、それを導として遠くの目標への航路を設定することができるのだ。

languages.text: 导航者是一种特殊的变种人，他们是人类在亚空间中的向导。只有他们能在灵魂之海中看到星炬的光芒，将其作为灯塔，为遥远的目标设定航线。
languages.original_text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

traits.locale_text: 导航者是一种特殊的变种人，他们是人类在亚空间中的向导。只有他们能在灵魂之海中看到星炬的光芒，将其作为灯塔，为遥远的目标设定航线。

languages.text: Navigatoren sind außergewöhnliche Mutanten, die der Menschheit als Führer durch den wütenden Warp dienen. Sie allein können das Licht des Astronomicans im Meer der Seelen sehen und mit seiner Hilfe Kurs auf ein fernes Ziel setzen.
languages.original_text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.

traits.locale_text: Navigatoren sind außergewöhnliche Mutanten, die der Menschheit als Führer durch den wütenden Warp dienen. Sie allein können das Licht des Astronomicans im Meer der Seelen sehen und mit seiner Hilfe Kurs auf ein fernes Ziel setzen.

languages.text: Rotacılar, İnsanlığa azgın öteboyut içinde rehberlik eden sıra dışı mutantlardır. Ruhlar Denizi'ndeki Astronomikan'ın ışığını bir tek onlar görüp uzak bir hedefe rota belirlemek için fener olarak kullanabilirler.
languages.original_text: Navigators are exceptional mutants who serve Humanity as guides through the raging warp. They alone can see the light of the Astronomican in the Sea of Souls and use it as a beacon to set a course for a distant target.
